reuze.pending

Class ConnectFourState

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.pending.ConnectFourState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ConnectFourState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A state of the Connect Four game is characterized by a board containing a grid of spaces for disks, the next player to move, and some utility informations. A win position for a player x is an empty space which turns a situation into a win situation for x if he is able to place a disk there.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
